pages.text: This advanced stabilizer is inhabited by an $(thing)Afrit$() that supports the dimensional matrix in keeping the storage dimension stable, thus allowing to store even more items.

pages.heading: Infusion
pages.ingredients: $(li)1x $(item)Storage Stabilizer Tier 2 $()$(li)1x $(item)Gold Block $()$(li)1x $(item)Nether Star $() $(li)1x $(item)Spirit Attuned Crystal $()
